servinfo.title: Fault Finding-Customer Complaints

attention3.ptxt: Before carrying out the procedures associated with customer complaints, check for the absence of faults and the conformity (or otherwise) of the parameters and statuses, using SUZUKI scan tool. If the customer complaint is not eliminated, then proceed according to the corresponding fault finding chart.

servinfo.ptxt: Table 1: No dialogue with the ECM
Table 2: The Engine Does Not Start
Table 3: The Engine Starts with Difficulty
Table 10: Oil leaks from the turbocharger
